body_html: Hello. Just to clarify things, there is no plan to add Java support (not Android only) to pytorch in a near future correct? I am considering switching from TF to pytorch but the lack of Java support is currently a limitation in my case.

body: Hello. Just to clarify things, there is no plan to add Java support (not Android only) to pytorch in a near future correct? I am considering switching from TF to pytorch but the lack of Java support is currently a limitation in my case.
